author: Kenneth Murray 🌊💚
text:
When Charlie was removed from the show, my taste for it just dropped.

Charlie was the soul of that series.
He should have never been removed. https://t.co/bcsgOMsbYR

author: Kenneth Murray 🌊💚
text:
HOW I MET YOUR MOTHER remains one of my best sitcoms  but the anti-climax was just pointless and emotionally draining.

They peaked my interest and when I was ready for a smooth end of the series, it was rather a bumpy ride which ended on a silly note. 
I'm disappointed till date https://t.co/DFWvhdN4rR

author: Kenneth Murray 🌊💚
text: This is a Liverpool vs Madrid final. It's obvious, yh ?

author: Kenneth Murray 🌊💚
text:
Punctuality is a turn on for me.

I'mma get attracted to a lady who reaches the venue of the program 5 minutes to time. 💯💯☺️☺️

author: Kenneth Murray 🌊💚
text:
16th Everton is a better team than 7th Manchester United.

There's nothing to debate here. Thanks.

author: Kenneth Murray 🌊💚
text:
This reminds me of how Lille officials had to chase Park Chu-Young to the airport on deadline day. 😂😂💔

Man was suppose to sign for Lille for £3 million after all the negotiations.
Arsene Wenger offered £10 million instead and man u-turned.
Year long negotiation in the mud. 😂 https://t.co/PF7v9xBYyA

author: Kenneth Murray 🌊💚
text:
They will definitely leave you in a devastating manner when they find someone else who their heart genuinely yearns for.

Trust me, you don't want to be in a long term relationship which is one-sided. You will regret it, that's for sure.

author: Kenneth Murray 🌊💚
text:
I chased a lady for 5 years and I was making progress but finally decided to let go when I started watching the "How I met your mother" series.
See, you can never force or convince anyone to love you. If you force them to love you and they do, it will be just for a limited time. https://t.co/OOdWAm1bNj

author: Kenneth Murray 🌊💚
text:
Happy birthday to my crush, @Mzdelah .
I pray for good health and prosperity over your life.
May you soar and perform marvelously in all your endeavors.

Anyways, the way I dey feel you erh, I just wish I was old enough to try my luck. I ruv you plenty wai 😂😂😂💔 https://t.co/F73SLLh7Az

author: Kenneth Murray 🌊💚
text:
Steven Gerrard has managed 20 games with Aston Villa so far.

His record :
8 wins, 2 draws, 10 losses.

If he loses today's game against Leicester, that will make 5 losses in a row equalling Dean Smith's 5-streak loss which led to his sacking.
